title: What put the end to Axl Rose's career? - Quora

response.answer_text: His career is far from over. Slash just announced new GnR material is being produced for an album. They will tour again. Stop the hating and go see them if you can. Axl is one of the best living performers in the world. Vocally and lyrically he is in the top twenty of all time singers. He isn’t what he used to be but still better than most of the kids trying to steal his belt.
